items.name: Hummus Plate
items.description: Smooth chickpeas blended with tahini, lemon, garlic and olive oil, lightly spiced.

items.name: Hummus Beef Plate
items.description: Smooth chickpeas blended with tahini, lemon, garlic and olive oil, lightly spiced with minced meat.

items.name: Hummus Chicken Plate
items.description: Smooth chickpeas blended with tahini, lemon, garlic, and olive oil lightly spiced with chicken.

items.name: Kebbeh
items.description: Crispy bulgur shells filled with spiced minced beef and onions, fried to a golden finish.

items.name: Falafel
items.description: Crispy chickpea patties with herbs and spices, served with fresh veggies and hummus.

items.name: Tabbouleh
items.description: Finely chopped parsley, tomatoes, mint, and onion with soaked bulgur, lemon and olive oil.

items.name: Shamandar
items.description: Diced beetroot with garlic, cumin, olive oil and lemon for a naturally sweet, earthy flavour.

items.name: Fattoush
items.description: Crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes and herbs with toasted pita in tangy lemon dressing.

items.name: Chicken Shawarma
items.description: Thinly sliced marinated chicken, spiced and grilled, served tender and juicy with a plate of fries

items.name: Beef Shawarma
items.description: Thinly sliced marinated beef, spiced and grilled, served tender and juicy with a plate of fries

items.name: Arabic Shawarma Plate
items.description: Shawarma served with chips, salad and sauces

items.name: Chicken Laffloufah
items.description: All the classic shawarma flavour in a soft mini roll—juicy meat, fresh crunch and creamy garlic sauce.

items.name: Beef Laffloufah
items.description: All the classic shawarma flavour in a soft mini roll—juicy meat, fresh crunch and creamy garlic sauce.

items.name: Full Chicken
items.description: Full rotisserie chicken served with rice, chips, coleslaw, sauces, pickles and 2 pieces of Arabic bread
items.description_ar: دجاج مشوي كامل مع أرز ومرافقات.

items.name: 2 Piece Chicken & Chips
items.description: 2 Piecer served with coleslaw, pickles, Arabic bread and sauces

items.name: 4 Piece Chicken & Chips
items.description: 4 Piecer served with coleslaw, pickles, Arabic bread and sauces

items.name: 8 Piece Chicken & Chips
items.description: 8 Piecer served with coleslaw, pickles, Arabic bread and sauces

items.name: Chicken Mandi
items.description: Tender, slow-cooked chicken served over fragrant basmati rice with traditional Mandi spices.

items.name: Lamb Mandi
items.description: Tender, slow-cooked lamb served over fragrant basmati rice with traditional Mandi spices.
